profile:
For over 25 years, Embark Homes has been providing top-tier, design-focused residential builds, renovations and construction management services to clients across the Lower Mainland. We believe that transparency and communication are key factors to managing and building beautiful, custom homes and pride ourselves on our ability to liaise seamlessly between our clients and tradespeople.

We are fully licensed residential home builders and offer 2 – 5 – 10 warranty by National Home Warranty.
memberships: HAVAN, CHBA, RenoMark, Better Business Bureau

profile:
Welcome to Pacific Blue Developments Ltd. We are Vancouver's premier custom home builders and we're here to make your dream a reality.  We specialize in custom homes, lane way homes, and duplexes.  Our experience, and knowledge of construction allows us to take the hassle out of building. We'll set a time to sit down with you and go over your project needs and work with you to achieve them. 

Some special things about us:

-We are family owned business
-We are a locally owned and operated business 
-We work on residential projects
-We work on commercial projects 
-We do all types of renovations 
-We work on and build high end homes 
-We work on and build cookie cutter homes 


****

Contact us today to schedule an appointment. We're looking forward to working with you.
name: Pacific Blue Developments Ltd

profile:
Urban Roots Build Co. Inc. is a Certified Residential Building Company and design build construction firm specializing in Custom Home build projects and renovations. We like to consider ourselves unique in that we truly care about the best interests of our customers. Straight up, honest, easy going and transparent…we are passionate about our craft and would love to work with you to offer advice and help you make the best decisions possible for your building project.

Over the last 25 years Mark and Grant have been very active in many facets of the building industry. They have worked for several top firms ranging from residential development to design build of medium to high end custom homes and renovations. From direct site management to management of construction divisions and company general management.

Our best sense of accomplishment comes when a homeowner is appreciating their new home and reflecting on how much they enjoyed the journey!

Call Mark to discuss your home project ideas and to discuss the process.
services: Design Build Construction, project management, general contracting
specialities: Renovations from bathrooms to complete full house re-builds, additions, Custom Homes, Exterior Spaces and Design Build
name: Urban Roots Build Co. Inc.

profile:
exceptional design.
extraordinary innovation.

It all begins with an idea. 
Maybe you want to launch a business. 
Or maybe you are just tired of what you have and want a change. 

Modera Developments has over a 13 years of experience in many facets of home renovations, design, construction, and project management. 
With our on-staff team of trade specialists, we’re able to offer competitive rates and a one-stop shop for your next build. 

Floor to Ceiling.
Renovations are a big undertaking, even the smallest of projects. 
We can help make these simple and easy with painting, flooring, ceiling resurfacing, and advice on best practices. 

Everything in-Between.
You may have the floors and ceilings covered, but what about the walls? We offer in-house trade specialists for plumbing, electrical, and insulation (spray foam or fiberglass). 
We also offer drywall services.

Providing the Right Support.
As part of being a one-stop shop, we can repair or replace your existing roof, from just the tiles/singles to a full replacement. 
Framing services are also available.

From the Ground up.
Starting from scratch? Looking to build a new lane home or coach house on your property? 
Let Modera design and build your home extension. 
We’re always on the cutting edge of trends for modular and condensed-footing homes, and can recommend options to maximize livability and budget.
name: MODERA Developments Ltd.

profile:
Vibe Design Build provides over 25 years experience in the design build space. 

We work to provide you with the absolute best design regardless of what your project entails.

Vibe handles all the details. We submit your project for building permits with the city and work closely with them to expedite the process. Once the permit is awarded we then execute your project to the highest standards with our highly skilled tradespeople. 

We deliver a project thats on time and on budget, all the while keeping you involved through our industry leading software system that provide you with 100% transparency throughout the project.
services:

Design
3D Rendering
Renovation
Custom Home
Additions
Basement suites
